ee athara shri lanka amarapura maha sangha sabhawe parshwa hayaka pamana hayawathawak da shri lanka ramanynya maha nikaye dewarak da sasungathawimata idakada labini.me athara shri lanka amarapura swejin nikaye saha 2000 di shri lanka ramanynya nikaye da benthara wanawasi parshawayen adhisil laba ek jiwithayak thula wisiekwarayak pawidiwimata ek jiwithayak thula thewarak adhisil laba ganimatada athi durlabha awasthawak mese udakaragaththe wishramika jyeshta kathikacharya harispaththuwe ariyawanshalankara swamindrayan wahanse ya.adhyapana amathyanshaye aagamika eekakaye niyamakayaku washayen 1976 di athipujya madihe panynyasiha mahanayaka swamindrayan wahansege pradhanathwayen mahacharya henpitagedara nyanawasa nahimi, aacharya hawanpola rathanasara nahimi, mahacharya yu.di. jayasekara, aacharya es.es. nishshanka ha yu.ech. mudalige mahathwaru athulu gihi pawidi widwathun samanga sama disawakama dina hathara bagin bududahama iganwim pilibanda sammanthrana guruwaru ha widuhalpathiwaru sandaha pawathwimata idakada labuni.ehidi bududahama ha jiwithaya pilibanda wishesha deshanayak panthi kamaraye di bhawana padamak iganwima pilibanda aadarsha prayogika padamak idiripath kirimata eda barawuye brahmachari dharmasena aariyathilaka wethaya.

esema langamata mahabhandagarayen rupiyal biliyana 1k denawita paudgalika bas sewawata kisidu mudalak nodi thawa thawath badu gasima asadharana bawath, me nisa manawa himikam komisamen mema asadharanayata erehiwa sadharanayak balaporoththu wana bawath, hethema ehidi pawasiya.

janadhipathiwaranayedi mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumange jayagrahanayata kapa wu lekhawus aayathanaye siyalu sewaka sewikawange milanga wagakima wanne aayathanayen wadath honda sewawak salasamin janadhipathithuma saha rajaya aaraksha kirima bawa janamadhya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha lekhawus aayathanaye pereda (01) pawathi uthsawayedi pawasiya.janadhipathiwarana wijayagrahanaya samarima pinisa lekhawus shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaya wisin me uthsawaya sanwidhana kara thibini.amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha mese da kiweya.janadhipathiwarana wijayagrahanaya samarima sandaha lekhawus aayathanaye nidahas sewaka sangamaya mewani uthsawayak sanwidhanaya kirima pilibandawa sathutu wenawa.lekhawus aayathanaye sabhapathi bandula padmakumara mahatha pramukha adhyaksha mandalaya ha aayathanaye bahuthara sewakayan janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage jayagrahanaya sandaha suwisal karyabharayak sidu kala.
